audioJson.name: Digital audio player
audioJson.aka: iPod, Mp3 player, Portable media player
audioJson.fact1: This format was marketed as "MP3 players", but it supported other popular digital audio formats like WAV, Windows Media Audio (WMA), Advanced Audio Coding (AAC), Vorbis, FLAC, Speex and Ogg
audioJson.fact2: This industry was largely defined and popularized by the Apple iPod
audioJson.fact3: Some players also included FM radio tuners, voice recording and other features
